mapper.sql: fullbuy_discount_marketing_id, marketing_id, full_price, fullbuy_discount, vip_full_price , vip_fullbuy_discount ,del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from np_fullbuy_discount_marketing where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0' ORDER BY full_price
mapper.insert:
insert into np_fullbuy_discount_marketing
fullbuy_discount_marketing_id,
marketing_id,
full_price,
fullbuy_discount,
vip_full_price,
vip_fullbuy_discount,
del_flag,

#{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update np_fullbuy_discount_marketing
marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fullbuy_discount = #{fullbuyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_full_price = #{vipFullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_fullbuy_discount = #{vipFullbuyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where fullbuy_discount_marketing_id = #{fullbuyDiscountMarketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update np_fullbuy_discount_marketing set del_flag = '1' where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update np_fullbuy_discount_marketing
full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fullbuy_discount = #{fullbuyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_full_price = #{vipFullPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_fullbuy_discount = #{vipFullbuyDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where marketing_id = #{marketingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
